verses.text: O Lord, do \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w be|strong="H1732"\w* bitter \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wrath; do \w not|strong="H1732"\w* send punishment \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* heat \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* passion.

\w Have|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3256"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* wasted away: \w make|strong="H3198"\w* \w me|strong="H3256"\w* well, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w even|strong="H0408"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* bones \w are|strong="H3068"\w* troubled.

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* bitter trouble; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w how|strong="H3588"\w* long?

Come back, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, make \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* free; \w O|strong="H0859"\w* give \w me|strong="H5315"\w* salvation because \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H4616"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w death|strong="H5315"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* no memory \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w*; \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* underworld \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* praise?

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* voice \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* sorrow \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* weariness \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w*; all \w the|strong="H3588"\w* night \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* bed wet \w with|strong="H7585"\w* weeping; \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* watered \w by|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* drops flowing \w from|strong="H7585"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* eyes.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* eyes \w are|strong="H0585"\w* wasting \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* trouble; \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0585"\w* becoming old \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0585"\w* \w against|strong="H3605"\w* \w me|strong="H3605"\w*.

Go \w from|strong="H5869"\w* \w me|strong="H3605"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* workers \w of|strong="H5869"\w* evil; \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w has|strong="H5869"\w* given ear \w to|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* voice \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* weeping.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H8085"\w* ear \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w request|strong="H6963"\w*; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* let \w my|strong="H3605"\w* prayer come \w before|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H6963"\w*.

Let all those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* against \w me|strong="H3947"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* shamed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* deeply troubled; let \w them|strong="H3947"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* turned \w back|strong="H3947"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* suddenly \w put|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* shame.
